a.detail: A narrow shaft falls into the corridor from above
a.summary: A narrow shaft falls into the corridor from above

c.detail: Several corpses are impaled upon iron spikes on the ceiling
c.summary: Several corpses are impaled upon iron spikes on the ceiling

details.floor: Uneven Flagstone (DC 10 to charge or run) (dense rubble, difficult terrain)
details.history: The dungeon was created by a beholder as a lair. It was eventually overrun by devils, and has lain empty for many centuries until recently.
details.illumination: Shadowy (phosphorescent fungus or candles every 20 ft.)

detail.room_features: The floor is covered in square tiles, alternating white and black, and someone has scrawled "The Blade of Compassion is reforged" in draconic script on the west wall

east.desc: Trapped and Unlocked Iron Door (60 hp)

    +5 to hit against one target, 1d10 cold damage

south.desc: Archway
